Title: Vaginatown
Plot: In order to distract Hank from his heartbreak, Ashby arranges a sex session with popular, yet incredibly annoying, celebrity chef, Chloe Metz. Charlie takes on a new client who?s eager to land the lead in a porn film called Vaginatown. Charlie meets with the film?s director and secures her the part, but only after investing $100,000 of his own savings.
